metadata.title: SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19: The most important research questions

abstract.original_text: Coronavirus disease 2019 caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is an ongoing global health emergency. Here we highlight nine most important research questions concerning virus transmission, asymptomatic and presymptomatic virus shedding, diagnosis, treatment, vaccine development, origin of virus and viral pathogenesis.

sentences.segment_text: Coronavirus disease 2019 caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 ( SARS-CoV-2 ) is an ongoing global health emergency .
Here we highlight nine most important research questions concerning virus transmission ,
origin of virus and viral pathogenesis .
